commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: The best way to cheer someone up when they're down is to go out and have a ball!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Woohoo! It's an arcade!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Is that...Honoka and Rin?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hello.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ayumu! Rina!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Heeey! Long time no see! Did you two come here to hang out?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup, we came to play a dancing game. I thought it would double as practice.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Really? Can we play too? We can all hang out together!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Totally!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Dancing with Î¼'s... I bet I'll learn a lot from this.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: First up are Rin and Ayumu. Break a leg, you guys! Start the music!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hah! Yah! Hyah!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hyah! Hup! Hah! *Giggle* This is so much fun!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: It sure is! I love to get my body moving!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Rin looks like she's having fun! We just gotta keep it up and hopefully she'll be as good as new!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Since we're here, why don't we play some of the other games? There's crane games and other stuff too.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh, if we're gonna go for crane games, I wanna try that one! You can get a bunch of snacks if you win!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Let me give it a try. I knew this day would come, so I've looked up all sorts of crane game strategies.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: How you win these games is based on the shape of the prizes. The bundle of snacks we're trying to get is big, but it rolls pretty easily since it's round.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm gonna aim for the one on its side here in the front. Once you've got the crane in the right position, direction, and angle... You strike!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow! Holy cow, that was amazing! You got it in one try!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We just got a boatload of snacks thanks to you, Rina! Thanks so much! Let's go see what we got in the rest area over there!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Now to feast our eyes on this prize! Oh, we've got some chocolate covered almonds here, some biscuits, and fried mochi! There's all kinds of stuff in here!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Lemme see! Wow, you weren't kidding! It's chock full of goodies! What's this one? Oh...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, those are really yummy too. They're super crunchy and taste just like ramen.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ramen...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, no! Um, uh, uhhh...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hm? What's the matter?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, it's uh, um...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh geez... So her favorite restaurant just...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah... So it's like, I gotta find a way to cheer her up somehow.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Is there anything we could do to help, Honoka?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rin's a dear friend to us too. We wanna be there for her.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ayumu, Rina... Thank you! Let's work together and get her back on her feet!

commands.speaker: Ayumu, Rina
commands.line: Yeah!
